metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The divine world has broken through into this one.

cognitieve_implicaties: The spiritual world is external and forceful
theologische_implicaties: God is transcendent and sovereign over the material plane
ethische_implicaties: Humanity must be prepared for sudden divine accountability
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests a dualism where God is normally absent

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'breakthrough' by linking it to the 'terrible' nature of angels rather than soft light.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher systematically deconstructs the 'Domesticated/Commercial' metaphor to replace it with the 'Military/Majestic' metaphor, maintaining a consistent focus on the 'Otherness' of God.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Commander' is identified as Christ, who is also the one 'with us in the flame,' merging power with presence.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the source domain of 'Angel' by using sensory language (burnished brass, smoke, drawn sword) to kill the 'cute' dead metaphor.
sterktes.voorbeeld: They wouldnâ€™t hurt a Lyme tick.

risicos.beschrijving: Heavy reliance on military imagery (smite, scythe, sword) can reinforce a violent image of God.
risicos.voorbeeld: smite the Egyptian firstborn... swing the apocalyptic scythe
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God primarily as an agent of destruction.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A battlefield outside the walls of Jericho at night.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective contrast between triviality and gravity.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By emphasizing the 'No' of the angel to human categories.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Perfectly fits the Feast of St. Michael (Michaelmas).

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in metaphor deconstruction. It identifies the 'Angel as Consumer Product' metaphor as a spiritual threat and systematically replaces it with 'Angel as Divine Presence.' The dominant landscape is one of awe, dread, and ultimate victory.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Focus on the physical 'weight' of the message (the 'glance' of the Lord).
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The angel's message is not a whisper but a tectonic shift.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition from the 'terrible' angel to the 'soup kitchen' quote.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly link the 'judgment' of the angel to the 'judgment' of the poor to bridge the military and social domains.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Commanders require blind obedience and use force.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Christ in the fire' imagery to show the Commander suffers with the troops.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To expand on the 'walls coming down' metaphor regarding the structures of the heart.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A profound use of CMT to rescue a biblical concept from cultural trivialization.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just noting the beauty of the Byron poem, CMT analyzes how the 'blast' and 'melted snow' map the power of God onto natural forces.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'feeling' or 'thinking' styles to show how the 'Commander' metaphor physically re-orients the hearer's stance (from looking at a pin to looking up at a sword).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the 'No' of the angel is a cognitive 'Schema Disruption' that forces the hearer to abandon the 'God is on my side' transaction.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses the 'No' of the angel as a pivot point for apophatic theology.
